keyEvents.title: Perona Learns of Moria's Reported Death
keyEvents.description: At Mihawk's castle on Kuraigana Island, Perona cries over news of Gecko Moria's reported death.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Confronts the Humandrills
keyEvents.description: In the forests of Kuraigana Island, Zoro battles humandrills who have learned his Three Sword Style.

keyEvents.title: Mihawk Explains the Humandrills' Origins
keyEvents.description: Mihawk reveals the history of the Shikkearu Kingdom that once existed on this island and how the humandrills learned to fight.

reveals.information: Kuraigana Island was formerly the site of the Shikkearu Kingdom, which experienced a major war several years before Mihawk moved there
The humandrills learned to fight and use weapons by observing the war in the Shikkearu Kingdom

description: A gloomy island in the Grand Line, formerly home to the Shikkearu Kingdom. Now inhabited by Dracule Mihawk, Perona, and intelligent humandrills who learned combat techniques from observing past wars.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Peace Attempt
keyEvents.description: Brook performs music and attempts to broker peace between the Longarm Tribe and local cultists.

keyEvents.title: Brook Captured by Longarm Tribe
keyEvents.description: Members of the Longarm Tribe kidnap Brook despite his peaceful intentions.

description: An island where Brook landed after being separated from the crew. The island has conflicts between the native population and members of the Longarm Tribe.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Decides to Return to Marineford
keyEvents.description: At Amazon Lily, Luffy agrees with Rayleigh's suggestion to return to Marineford and expresses his desire to reunite with his crew.

description: The island home of the Kuja tribe, located in the Calm Belt. Luffy recuperates here after the Summit War while planning his next move with Rayleigh.
